abilities.description: Provides 30 health regeneration when cast on allies, and deals 25 damage per second when cast on enemies. Lasts 8 seconds. Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within 1400 units. Only the closest Urn to the dying hero will gain a charge.

additionalInformation: The item's attributes grants the following additional bonuses:
24 mana, 0.1 mana regeneration and 0.2% flat base magic resistance.
2 main attack damage to all / / heroes.
4.2 main attack damage to universal heroes.
name: Urn of Shadows
description: Contains the ashes of powerful demons.
tips: Urn of Shadows is a great item to have when going for a heavy ganking lineup, as it helps heal any damage taken while finishing off any low health enemies.
